newsitem.title: USA: U.S. high-yield corporate bond forward calendar.
newsitem.headline: U.S. high-yield corporate bond forward calendar.

text.p: The following information on high-yield bond offerings was gathered from market sources:
HIGH-YIELD BOND OFFERINGS EXPECTED WEEK OF 5/5/97:
(Company/Amount/Issue/Maturity/Lead Mgr/Rating/Price Talk)
*CITYSCAPE FINANCIAL CORP $300 million 144a sr notes due 04 CIBC B1/B 11.50%
*GST TELECOM INC $230 million 144a sr sec nts 07 3-yr prefund MS 13.00%/13.25%
